Key Match Events: Riley Greene and Kerry Carpenter homered in a three-run sixth inning
Brant Hurter picked up his second MLB win in his first start
Johnny Cueto took the loss in his second start of the season
Matt Vierling tied the score with a double, but Jo Adell's error allowed Kerry Carpenter to score
Jake Rogers homered to center in the fifth inning
Greene made it 4-2 with a long homer in the sixth
Carpenter added his 13th homer of the season, a two-run shot, later in the sixth
Miscellaneous Highlights: The start of the game was delayed 2 hours, 45 minutes by heavy storms
The Angels placed LHP Matt Moore on the 15-day injured list with a left forearm strain and selected the contract of RHP Ryan Miller from Triple-A Salt Lake City
The Angels moved OF Mike Trout to the 60-day injured list
